channel.title: Character Folio on strongly typed
channel.description: Recent content in Character Folio on strongly typed

item.title: Monthly Character Folio - September 2020
item.description:
So I’m going to try and do a thing. I’m going to try and publish at least one character folio per month. It forces me to write, and it gives something back to the community. Hell, I’ll probably even use them.

First up is a Ventrue Childer - King of the Tower Block.

I wanted to create somebody that was slightly based on the Tzimisce Lord of the Ghetto example character from the revised clan book - but with a rather insidious twist from the Sandman Predator Type. Coupled with some use of Presence: Lingering Kiss, you’ve got yourself a truely creepy monster that calls the tower his own.

Download the Character Folio PDF.
